title: 100 Years of Japanese Cinema (1994) narrated by Nagisa Oshima
description:
Documentary: 
This is a brief introduction to the diverse world of 
Japanese cinema presented by Japanese film director 
Nagisa Oshima (Koshikei - Death by Hanging, Ai no 
corrida - In the Realm of Senses). 
The clips are quite short but still reveal a small 
glimpse of what Japan has to offer in the area of 
film.

Languages: Japanese soundtrack, English soft subtitles (SRT) 

Video duration: 51:43
Video specs: Xvid 704x528 23.98fps 
Audio specs: MP3 48000Hz stereo
